Package it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.client.gui.controls

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionOverlay
    An overlay used to represent and select an action the player can perform
    AmmoPane
    A custom control to show information about the ammo owned by the user
    AmmoSquareOverlay
    A class describing an overlay representing an ammo square
    BoardSelectionOverlay
    A class describing an overlay used to select the board configuration, showing the thumbnail of the board
    EffectSelectionOverlay
    A custom control used to select effects of a weapon, showing information about: The name of the effect The description of the effect The cost of the effect in terms of ammo cubes
    IntegerSelectionOverlay
    An overlay used to select an integer value, showing it in a square container
    KillshotsTrack
    A control representing the killshots track, providing methods to show current amount of remaining skulls Available skulls are those that are visible, unavailable ones are removed from the left, in order to make the flaming skull the last one
    MatchInfoPane
    A custom control based on a VBox showing information about the match, namely: Name of the player that is playing in the current turn Score of the user List of participating players along with their character color
    ObservableOverlay<T>
    A class describing an overlay that can be observed to catch fired events
    OrientableImage
    A control extending Pane that allows the provided image to be rotated according to the provided orientation
    PlayerBoardControl
    A custom control representing the player board, showing information about: Player name Count of deaths Count of marks Received damages
    PlayerOperationOverlay
    An overlay used to represent and select an operation the player can perform
    PlayerSelectionOverlay
    An overlay used to select a player, showing the name of the player and the picture of its character
    PowerupOverlay
    An overlay used to select a powerup, showing the graphical representation of its card
    PowerupsContainer
    A custom control extending an HBox container that contains images of powerup cards
    SelectableOverlay<T>
    A class describing an overlay that can be selected (e.g. by clicking on it) It extends the ObservableOverlay to notify listeners that it has been selected
    SpawnSquareOverlay
    A class describing an overlay representing a spawn square
    SquareOverlay
    An abstract class describing an overlay representing a square of the game board
    WeaponCardOverlay
    An overlay used to select a weapon, showing the graphical representation of its card
    WeaponImage
    A specialized OrientableImage that shows the card image of a weapon, along with a tooltip telling its name.
    WeaponsContainer
    A custom control extending an HBox container that contains images of weapon cards
    WeaponsInfoPane
    A custom control extending a VBox representing a table showing information about the weapons owned by the players It also allows to set a consumer of the image ids to handle the events generated when the user clicks on the "info" button of a weapon
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    OrientationEnum
    An enumerator describing the orientation of an object in the space
